Text.Page:
Corrupted creature attacks are on the rise. To prevent the rise of more wraiths, kill {@LinkCreature:28#3031#blighted jalmaraks}, {@LinkCreature:28#3041#fallen wraiths}, {@LinkCreature:28#3051#tainted jalmaraks}, {@LinkCreature:28#1031#tumbling sporewalkers}, and {@LinkCreature:28#1041#corrupted mycanars}.

Move quickly now, and report to Laneama when mission is complete.
Your efforts are much appreciated. In fact, should you wish to earn more coin, I'm authorized to pay bounties on these creatures until further notice.
It's a tall order, I realize, but until it's fulfilled, I can't compensate you.
